name: HEAD RUSH
description:
Head Rush is an arcade flying time-trial game where you control Neura, an organism sent to help her owner Bob feel happier. Fly through Bob's surreal mind and stop his bad vibes once and for all!

A game designed by Jellyware Games, a 4th Year Capstone team from Sheridan College in Ontario, Canada.

Technical Designer -Eleanor Chan
Game Designer - Jesse Sponder
Level Designer - Devon Wiersma
2D Artist - Daylan Rogan
3D Artist - Brennan McNamara
Composer - Rafael Lopez
